dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1623 IH: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to exclude certain propane storage facilities from certain chemical security standards under the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Finstad (for himself and Mr. Costa) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to exclude certain propane storage facilities from certain chemical security standards under the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

section.header: Exclusion of certain propane storage facilities from certain chemical security standards under the Department of Homeland Security

subsection.text: Title XXI of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 (6 U.S.C. 621 et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking or after the semicolon at the end;
in subparagraph (E), by inserting or after the semicolon at the end; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subject to section 2110, a facility that stores propane for sale to or use by a dwelling (as such term is defined in section 802(b) of the Fair Housing Act (42 U.S.C. 3602(b))), sale to or use in agricultural production (as such term is defined in section 4279.2 of title 7, Code of Federal Regulations), or sale to or use by small business concerns (as such term is described under section 3 of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632)) that are located in rural areas (as such term is defined in section 520 of the Housing Act of 1949 (42 U.S.C. 1490));

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following new section:

section.header: Determination relating to certain propane storage facilities
section.text: If the Secretary makes a determination that a propane storage facility does not satisfy the requirements of an excluded facility, the Secretary shall—

paragraph.text: submit to Congress a report relating thereto; and
provide notification to the owner or operator of such propane storage facility relating thereto.

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 1(b) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 2109 the following new item:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 2110. Determination relating to certain propane storage facilities.
